metadata.title: CVE-2020-27787 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A Segmentaation fault was found in UPX in invert_pt_dynamic() function inp_lx_elf.cpp. An attacker with a crafted input file allows invalid memoryaddress access that could lead to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: upx-ucl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
